thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: charles o'brien
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 charles o'brien

author: charles o'brien
title: charles o'brien
text:
All purchases arrive swiftly and always a good price,best I've used.
I tried to do it in one sentence but know I can add more.Each order I've received has arrived quickly been the correct item and lives up to its advert.None of the photographs showing an impressive item and reality just tat.Everything I've bought has been as it was advertised.
